ThingDef.label: advanced anti-matter core
ThingDef.description: A special energy storage unit of Glitterworld origin. This AM core houses all the components needed to maintain reaction mass to power components in a small footprint. It is the perfect device for the enthusiast advanced-tier user with high output and high capacity and meets any need.

ThingDef.label: advanced fusion-hub
ThingDef.description: A special energy storage unit of Glitterworld origin. This fusion-hub houses all the components needed to maintain reaction mass to power components in a small footprint The design is similar to the anti-matter core although a weaker version for a more attractive pricepoint. It is sufficient for the advanced-tier user. It has low output and high capacity for its class (although its output is higher than lower tier tech).

ThingDef.label: sleepstopper
ThingDef.description: A special brain implant of Glitterworld origin. This will stop the user from naturally needing sleep. However, users who take substances might find themselves falling asleep anyway. It is popular among glitterworlds among students and doctors alike for the productivity boost experienced.

The user will not experience pain and will not naturally need sleep. Same caveat from the sleepstopper, substance users might occassionally find themselves falling asleep or needing sleep.
